strapiPost.title: Lights, Sounds, and Seesaws
strapiPost.content:
Haven't been on a seesaw in a while? Here's a good excuse to hop on one. Impulse, an outdoor seesaw art installation of light and sound, is doing a pop-up at the Scott Family Amazeum in Bentonville.

  • Tell me more: The installation is an interactive work comprised of 12 light and sound enabled seesaws that change when in motion.
  • Open day and night, no admission needed. You can see the seesaws from now until May 10. The exhibit was first presented in 2015 in Montreal and has since made its way to Bentonville for your enjoyment.

Want more? Check out these videos HERE.
